사이오닉 직업

PSIONIC CLASSES

파워 포인트 비축

THE POWER POINT RESERVE

Psionic characters fuel their 능력 through a pool, or reserve, of 파워 포인트. Your power point reserve is equal to your base 파워 포인트 gained from your class, 보너스 파워 포인트 from a high 핵심 능력 score (see 능력치와 구현자, below), and any additional 보너스 파워 포인트 from sources such as your character race and feat selections.

멀티직업 사이오닉 캐릭터
Multiclass Psionic Characters

If you have 레벨 in more than one psionic class, you combine your 파워 포인트 from each class to make up your reserve. You can use these 파워 포인트 to manifest powers from any psionic class you have.

While you maintain a single reserve of 파워 포인트 from your class, race, and feat selections, you are still limited by 구현자 레벨 you have achieved with each power you know.

능력치와 구현자

ABILITIES AND MANIFESTERS

The ability that your powers depend on—your 핵심 능력 score as a manifester—is related to what psionic class (or classes) you have 레벨 in: 지능(사이언), 지혜(사이킥 군인), and 매력(와일더). The 수정치 for this ability is referred to as your 핵심 능력 수정치. If your character의 핵심 능력 score is 9 or lower, you can’t manifest powers from that psionic class.

Just as a high 지능 score grants 보너스 주문 to a 마법사 and a high 지혜 score grants 보너스 주문 to a 사제, a character who manifests powers (사이언, 사이킥 군인, and 와일더) gains 보너스 파워 포인트 according to his key ability score. Refer to 표: 능력 수정치 and 보너스 파워 포인트.

How To Determine 보너스 파워 포인트: Your 핵심 능력 score grants you additional 파워 포인트 equal to your 핵심 능력 수정치 x your 구현자 레벨 x1/2. 표: 능력 수정치 and 보너스 파워 포인트 shows these calculations for 직업 레벨 1st through 20th and key 능력 점수 from 10 to 41.

사이언

PSION

성향: 제한 없음.

히트 다이스: d4.

직업 스킬
Class Skills

사이언의 직업 스킬(핵심 능력): 집중* (Con), 제작(Int), 지식(all 스킬, taken individually)* (Int), 전문직(Wis), and 사이크래프트* (Int). In addition, a 사이언 gains access to additional 직업 스킬 based on his 분야:

예언가(초감각): 정보 수집(Cha), 듣기(Wis), and 감지(Wis).

조형가(재귀창조): 허세(Cha), 변장(Cha), and 사이오닉 장치 사용하기* (Cha).

염동력자(염동력): 자기최면* (Wis), 장치 무력화(Dex), and 위협(Cha).

에고이스트(정신적대사작용): 자기최면* (Wis), 균형(Dex) and 치료(Wis).

유목민(시공간초월): 등반(Str), 도약(Str), 탑승(Dex), 생존(Wis), and 수영(Str).

정신감응가(정신감응): 허세(Cha), 외교(Cha), 정보 수집(Cha), and 의도 파악(Wis).

*New skill or expanded use of existing skill.

첫 레벨에서 스킬 포인트: (2 + Int 수정치) × 4.

레벨이 오를 때마다 추가 스킬 포인트: 2 + Int 수정치.

직업 특성
Class Features

All the following are 직업 특성 of 사이언.

무기와 갑옷 숙련: 사이언 are proficient with the club, dagger, heavy crossbow, 빛 crossbow, quarterstaff, and shortspear. They are not proficient with any type of 갑옷 or 방패. 갑옷 does not, however, interfere with the manifestation of powers.

파워 포인트/일: A 사이언의 ability to manifest powers is limited by 파워 포인트 he has available. His base daily allotment of 파워 포인트 is given on 표: 사이언. In addition, he receives 보너스 파워 포인트 per day if he has a high 지능 score (see 표: 능력 수정치 and 보너스 파워 포인트). His race may also provide 보너스 파워 포인트 per day, as may certain 특기 and items.

분야: Every 사이언 must decide at 1 레벨 which psionic 분야 he will specialize in. Choosing a 분야 provides a 사이언 with access to 직업 스킬 associated with that 분야(see above), as well as the powers restricted to that 분야. However, choosing a 분야 also means that 사이언 cannot learn powers that are restricted to other 분야. He can’t even use such powers by employing 사이오닉 아이템.

Powers Known: A 사이언 begins play knowing three 사이언 powers of your choice. Each time he achieves a new 레벨, he unlocks 지식 of new powers.

Choose the powers known from 사이언 파워 목록, or from the list of powers of your chosen 분야. You cannot choose powers from 분야 other than your chosen 분야. (Exception: 특기 지식의 확장 and 에픽 지식의 확장 do allow a 사이언 to learn powers from the lists of other 분야 or even other classes.) A 사이언 can manifest any power that has a power point cost equal to or lower than his 구현자 레벨.

The number of times a 사이언 can manifest powers in a day is limited only by his daily 파워 포인트.

A 사이언 simply knows his powers; they are ingrained in his mind. He does not need to prepare them (in the way that some spellcasters prepare their 주문), though he must get a good night의 수면 each day to regain all his spent 파워 포인트.

난이도 등급 for 내성 굴림 against 사이언 powers is 10 + the power의 레벨 + 사이언의 지능 수정치. Maximum Power 레벨 Known: A 사이언 begins play with the ability to learn 1st-레벨 powers. As he attains higher 레벨, a 사이언 may gain the ability to master more complex powers.

To learn or manifest a power, a 사이언 must have an 지능 score of at least 10 + the power의 레벨.

보너스 특기: A 사이언 gains 보너스 특기 at 1 레벨, 5th 레벨, 10 레벨, 15th 레벨, and 20th 레벨. This feat must be a psionic feat, a metapsionic feat, or a psionic item creation feat.

These 보너스 특기 are in addition to 특기 that a character of any class gains every three 레벨. A 사이언 is not limited to 사이오닉 특기, 메타사이오닉 특기, and 사이오닉 아이템 제작 특기 when choosing these other 특기.

PSIONIC 분야

A 분야 is one of six groupings of powers, each defined by a common theme. The six 분야 are 초감각, 재귀창조, 염동력, 정신적대사작용, 시공간초월, and 정신감응.

초감각: A 사이언 who chooses 초감각 is known as a 예언가. 예언가 can learn precognitive powers to 보조 their comrades in 전투, as well as powers that permit them to 정보 수집 in many different ways.

재귀창조: A 사이언 specializing in 재귀창조 is known as a 조형가. This 분야 includes powers that draw ectoplasm or matter from 영적 세계, creating semisolid and solid items such as 갑옷, 무기, or animated constructs to do battle at 조형가의 명령.

염동력: 사이언 who specialize in 염동력 are known as 염동력자. They are the masters of powers that manipulate and transform matter and energy. 염동력자 can 공격 with devastating blasts of energy.

정신적대사작용: A 사이언 who specializes in 정신적대사작용 is known as an 에고이스트. This 분야 consists of powers that alter 사이언의 psychobiology, or that of creatures near him. An 에고이스트 can both 치료 and transform himself into a fearsome 전사.

시공간초월: A 사이언 who relies on 시공간초월 powers is known as a 유목민. 유목민 can wield powers that propel or displace objects in space or time.

정신감응: A 사이언 who chooses 분야 of 정신감응 is known as a 정신감응가. He is the master of powers that allow mental contact and control of other sentient creatures. A 정신감응가 can deceive or destroy the minds of his enemies with ease.

정신결정

A 정신결정 is a fragment of a psionic character의 personality, brought into physical form and a semblance of life (via 정신결정 친화력 feat). A 정신결정 appears as a crystalline construct about the size of a human hand.

Because it is an extension of its creator의 personality, a character의 정신결정 is in some ways a part of him. That의 why, for example, a psionic character can manifest a personal 거리 power on his 정신결정 even though normally he can manifest such a power only on himself.

A 정신결정 is treated as a construct for 목적 of all effects that depend on its type.

A 정신결정 grants 특수 능력 to its owner, as shown on 정신결정 특수 능력 table below. In addition, a 정신결정 has a personality (being a fragment of the owner의 personality), which gives its owner 보너스 on certain types of checks or 내성 굴림, as given on 정신결정 Personalities table below. These 특수 능력 and 보너스 apply only when the owner and 정신결정 are within 1 mile of each other.

정신결정 능력 are based on the owner의 레벨 in 사이오닉 직업. 레벨 from other classes do not count toward the owner의 레벨 for 목적 of 정신결정 능력.

A 정신결정 can 말하기 one language of its owner의 choice (so long as it is a language the owner knows). A 정신결정 can understand all other languages known by its owner, but cannot 말하기 them. This is a supernatural ability.

정신결정 기본: Use the statistics for a 정신결정, but make the following changes.

내성 굴림: A 정신결정 uses its owner의 base 내성 굴림 보너스 and 능력 수정치 on 내성 굴림, though it doesn’t enjoy any other 보너스 its owner might have (from 마법 아이템 or 특기, for example).

능력: When its self-propulsion ability is not activated, a 정신결정 has no 근력 score and no 민첩 score.

스킬: A 정신결정 has the same skill ranks as its owner, except that it has a minimum of 4 ranks each in 감지, 듣기, 조용히 이동, and 탐색. (Even if its owner has no ranks in these 스킬, a 정신결정 has 4 ranks in each.) A 정신결정 uses its own 능력 수정치 on 스킬 판정.

정신결정 Ability 묘사: All 정신결정 have 특수 능력(or impart 능력 to their owners) depending on 레벨 of the owner, as shown on the table above. 능력 on the table are cumulative.

자연 갑옷 Adj. (Ex): This number noted here is an improvement to 정신결정의 자연 갑옷 보너스(normally 0). It represents a 정신결정의 preternatural durability.

지능 Adj. (Ex): Add this value to 정신결정의 지능 score. 정신결정 are as smart as people (though not necessarily as smart as smart people).

경계(Ex): The presence of a 정신결정 sharpens its master의 senses. While a 정신결정 is within arm의 reach (adjacent to or in the same square as its owner), its owner gains 경계 feat.

향상된 회피 (Ex): If a 정신결정 is subjected to an 공격 that normally allows a Reflex 내성 굴림 for half 피해, it takes no 피해 if it makes a successful 내성 굴림 and half 피해 even if 내성 굴림 fails.

Personality (Ex): Every 정신결정 has a personality. See 정신결정 Personality, below.

Self-Propulsion (Su): As a standard action, its owner can will a 정신결정 to form spidery, ectoplasmic legs that grant the 정신결정 a land 속도 of 30 feet and a 등반 속도 of 20 feet. The legs fade into nothingness after one day (or sooner, if the owner desires).

Share Powers (Su): At the owner의 option, he can have any power (but not any psi-like ability) he manifests on himself also affect his 정신결정. 정신결정 must be within 5 feet of him at the time of the manifestation to receive the benefit. If the power has a 지속시간 other than instantaneous, it stops affecting 정신결정 if it 이동 farther than 5 feet away, and will not affect 정신결정 again, even if it returns to its owner before 지속시간 expires.

Additionally, the owner can manifest a power with a target of “You” on his 정신결정(as a touch 거리 power) instead of on himself. The owner and 정신결정 cannot share powers if the powers normally do not affect creatures of 정신결정의 type (construct).

Sighted (Ex): Although it has no physical sensory organs, a 정신결정 can telepathically sense its 환경 as well as a creature with normal 시야 and hearing. 암흑(even supernatural 암흑) is irrelevant, as are 범위 of supernatural 침묵, though a 정신결정 still can’t discern invisible or ethereal beings. A 정신결정의 sighted 거리 is 40 feet.

Telepathic Link (Su): The owner has a telepathic link with his 정신결정 out to a distance of up to 1 mile. The owner cannot see through 정신결정의 senses, but the two of them can communicate telepathically as if 정신결정 were the target of a 정신연결 power manifested by the owner. For instance, a 정신결정 placed in a distant room could relay the activities occurring in that room.

Because of the telepathic link between a 정신결정 and its owner, the owner has the same connection to an item or place that 정신결정 does. For instance, if his 정신결정 has seen a room, the owner can 순간이동 into that room as if he has seen it too.

Deliver Touch Powers (Su): If the owner is 3rd 레벨 or higher, his 정신결정 can deliver touch powers for him. If the owner and 정신결정 are in contact at the time the owner manifests a touch power, he can designate his 정신결정 as the “toucher.” 정신결정 can then deliver the touch power just as the owner could. As usual, if the owner manifests another power before the touch is delivered, the touch power dissipates.

Telepathic Speech (Ex): If the owner is 5th 레벨 or higher, 정신결정 can communicate telepathically with any creature that has a language and is within 30 feet of 정신결정, while 정신결정 is also within 1 mile of the owner.

Flight (Su): If the owner is 9th 레벨 or higher, he can, as a standard action, will his 정신결정 to 비행 at a 속도 of 50 feet (poor). 정신결정 drifts gently to the ground after one day (or sooner, if the owner desires).

파워 저항(Ex): If the owner is 11th 레벨 or higher, 정신결정 gains 파워 저항 equal to the owner의 레벨 + 5. To affect 정신결정 with a power, another manifester must get a result on a 구현자 레벨 check that equals or exceeds 정신결정의 파워 저항.

Sight Link (Sp): If the owner is 13 레벨 이상, the character can remote view 정신결정(as if manifesting the remote view power) once per day.

Channel Power (Sp): If the owner is 15th 레벨 or higher, he can manifest powers through 정신결정 to a distance of up to 1 mile. 정신결정 is treated as the power의 originator, and all 거리 are calculated from its location.

When channeling a power through his 정신결정, the owner manifests the power by paying its power point cost. He is still subject to 기회 공격 and other hazards of manifesting a power, if applicable (for instance, he becomes visible when manifesting an offensive power if invisible, as does 정신결정).

정신결정 Personality (Ex): Each 정신결정 has a distinct personality, chosen by its owner at the time of its creation from among those given on the following table. At 1 레벨, its owner typically gets a feel for a 정신결정의 personality only through occasional impulses, but as the owner increases in 레벨 정신결정의 personality becomes more pronounced. At higher 레벨, it is not uncommon for a 정신결정 to constantly ply its owner with observations and advice, often severely slanted toward 정신결정의 particular worldview. The owner always sees a bit of himself in his 정신결정, even if magnified and therefore distorted.

사이킥 군인

PSYCHIC WARRIOR

성향: 제한 없음.

히트 다이스: d8.

Class Features

All the following are 직업 특성 of 사이킥 군인.

무기와 갑옷 숙련: 사이킥 군인 are proficient with all simple and martial 무기, with all types of 갑옷(heavy, medium, and 빛), and with 방패(except tower 방패).

파워 포인트/일: A 사이킥 군인의 ability to manifest powers is limited by 파워 포인트 he has available. His base daily allotment of 파워 포인트 is given on 표: 사이킥 군인. In addition, he receives 보너스 파워 포인트 per day if he has a high 지혜 score (see 표: 능력 수정치 and 보너스 파워 포인트). His race may also provide 보너스 파워 포인트 per day, as may certain 특기 and items. A 1st-레벨 사이킥 군인 gains no 파워 포인트 for his 직업 레벨, but he gains 보너스 파워 포인트(if he is entitled to any), and can manifest the single power he knows with those 파워 포인트.

Powers Known: A 사이킥 군인 begins play knowing one 사이킥 군인 power of your choice. Each time he achieves a new 레벨, he unlocks 지식 of a new power.

Choose the powers known from 사이킥 군인 파워 목록. (Exception: 특기 지식의 확장 and 에픽 지식의 확장 do allow a 사이킥 군인 to learn powers from the lists of other classes.) A 사이킥 군인 can manifest any power that has a power point cost equal to or lower than his 구현자 레벨.

The total number of powers a 사이킥 군인 can manifest in a day is limited only by his daily 파워 포인트.

A 사이킥 군인 simply knows his powers; they are ingrained in his mind. He does not need to prepare them (in the way that some spellcasters prepare their 주문), though he must get a good night의 수면 each day to regain all his spent 파워 포인트.

난이도 등급 for 내성 굴림 against 사이킥 전사 파워 is 10 + the power의 레벨 + 사이킥 군인의 지혜 수정치.

Maximum Power 레벨 Known: A 사이킥 군인 begins play with the ability to learn 1st-레벨 powers. As he attains higher 레벨, he may gain the ability to master more complex powers.

To learn or manifest a power, a 사이킥 군인 must have a 지혜 score of at least 10 + the power의 레벨.

보너스 특기: At 1 레벨, a 사이킥 군인 gets 보너스 전투-oriented feat in addition to the feat that any 1 레벨 character gets and 보너스 특기 granted to a human character. 사이킥 군인 gains an additional 보너스 특기 at 2nd 레벨 and every three 레벨 thereafter (5th, 8th, 11th, 14th, 17th, and 20th). These 보너스 특기 must be drawn from 특기 noted as 전사 보너스 특기 or 사이오닉 특기. 사이킥 군인 must still meet all 전제조건 for 보너스 feat, including ability score and 기본 공격 보너스 minimums as well as class 필요조건. A 사이킥 군인 cannot choose 특기 that specifically require 레벨 in 전사 class unless he is a multiclass character with the requisite 레벨 in 전사 class.

These 보너스 특기 are in addition to 특기 that a character of any class gains every three 레벨. A 사이킥 군인 is not limited to 전사 보너스 특기 and 사이오닉 특기 when choosing these other 특기.

Class Features

All the following are 직업 특성 of 소울나이프.

Mind Blade (Su): As a 이동 action, a 소울나이프 can create a semisolid blade composed of psychic energy distilled from his own mind. The blade is identical in all ways (except visually) to a short sword of a size appropriate for its wielder. For instance, a Medium 소울나이프 materializes a Medium mind blade that he can wield as a 빛 weapon, and the blade deals 1d6 points of 피해(crit 19–20/x2). Soulknives who are smaller or larger than Medium create mind blades identical to short swords appropriate for their size, with a corresponding change to the blade의 피해. The wielder of a mind blade gains the usual benefits to his 명중 굴림 and 피해 roll from a high 근력 보너스.

The blade can be broken (it has hardness 10 and 10 히트 포인트); however, a 소울나이프 can simply create another on his next 이동 action. The moment he relinquishes his grip on his blade, it dissipates (unless he intends to throw it; see below). A mind blade is considered a 마법 무기 for 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

A 소울나이프 can 특기 사용 such as 강한 공격 or 전투 숙련 in conjunction with the mind blade just as if it were a normal weapon. He can also choose mind blade for 특기 requiring a specific weapon choice, such as 무기 전문화. Powers or 주문 that upgrade 무기 can be used on a mind blade.

A 소울나이프의 mind blade improves as the character gains higher 레벨. At 4 레벨 and every four 레벨 thereafter, the mind blade gains a cumulative +1 enhancement 보너스 on 명중 굴림 and 피해 rolls (+2 at 8th 레벨, +3 at 12th 레벨, +4 at 16 레벨, and +5 at 20th 레벨).

Even in places where psionic effects do not normally function (such as within a 무의 사이오닉 장), a 소울나이프 can attempt to sustain his mind blade by making a DC 20 Will save. On a successful save, 소울나이프 maintains his mind blade for a number of rounds equal to his 직업 레벨 before he needs to check again. On an unsuccessful attempt, the mind blade vanishes. As a 이동 action on his turn, 소울나이프 can attempt a new Will save to rematerialize his mind blade while he remains within 사이오닉 negating effect.

무기 집중(Mind Blade): A 소울나이프 gains 무기 집중(mind blade) as 보너스 특기.

거친 재능: A 소울나이프 gains 거친 재능 as 보너스 특기. (This class feature provides the character with the psionic power he needs to materialize his mind blade, if he has no 파워 포인트 otherwise.)

Throw Mind Blade (Ex): A soul knife of 2nd 레벨 or higher can throw his mind blade as a ranged weapon with a 거리 increment of 30 feet.

Whether or not 공격 hits, a thrown mind blade then dissipates. A 소울나이프 of 3rd 레벨 or higher can make a psychic strike (see below) with a thrown mind blade and can use the blade in conjunction with other 특수 능력(such as Knife to the Soul; see below).

Psychic Strike (Su): As a 이동 action, a 소울나이프 of 3rd 레벨 or higher can imbue his mind blade with destructive psychic energy. This effect deals an extra 1d8 points of 피해 to the next living, nonmindless target he successfully hits with a melee 공격(or ranged 공격, if he is using the throw mind blade ability). Creatures immune to 정신영향계 effects are immune to psychic strike 피해. (Unlike 도적의 sneak 공격, the psychic strike is not precision 피해 and can affect creatures otherwise immune to extra 피해 from critical hits or more than 30 feet away, provided they are living, nonmindless creatures not immune to 정신영향계 effects.)

A mind blade deals this extra 피해 only once when this ability is called upon, but a 소울나이프 can imbue his mind blade with psychic energy again by taking another 이동 action.

Once a 소울나이프 has prepared his blade for a psychic strike, it holds the extra energy until it is used. Even if 소울나이프 drops the mind blade (or it otherwise dissipates, such as when it is thrown and misses), it is still imbued with psychic energy when 소울나이프 next materializes it.

At every four 레벨 beyond 3rd (7th, 11th, 15th, and 19th), the extra 피해 from a 소울나이프의 psychic strike increases as shown on the Table above.

Free Draw (Su): At 5th 레벨, a 소울나이프 becomes able to materialize his mind blade as a free action instead of a 이동 action. He can make only one attempt to materialize the mind blade per round, however.

Shape Mind Blade (Su): At 5th 레벨, a 소울나이프 gains the ability to change the form of his mind blade. As a fullround action, he can change his mind blade to replicate a longsword (피해 1d8 for a Medium weapon wielded as a one-handed weapon) or a bastard sword (피해 1d10 for a Medium weapon, but he must wield it as a two-handed weapon unless he knows 특이 무기 숙련(bastard sword) feat). If a 소울나이프 shapes his mind blade into the form of a bastard sword and wields it two-handed, he adds 1-1/2 times his 근력 보너스 to his 피해 rolls, just like when using any other two-handed weapon.

Alternatively, a 소울나이프 can split his mind blade into two identical short swords, suitable for fighting with a weapon in each hand. (The normal 페널티 for fighting with two 무기 apply.) However, both mind blades have an enhancement 보너스 1 lower than 소울나이프 would otherwise create with a single mind blade.

Mind Blade Enhancement (Su): At 6th 레벨, a 소울나이프 gains the ability to enhance his mind blade. He can add any one of the weapon 특수 능력 on the table below that has an enhancement 보너스 value of +1.

Multiple Throw (Ex): At 17th 레벨 and higher, a 소울나이프 can throw a number of mind blades per round equal to the number of melee 공격 he could make.

When she does so, she gains +1 to her 구현자 레벨 with that manifestation of the power. 구현자 레벨 boost gives her the ability to augment her powers to a higher degree than she otherwise could; however, she pays no extra power point for this wild surge. Instead, the additional 1 power point that would normally be required to augment the power is effectively supplied by the wild surge.

레벨-dependent power effects are also improved, depending on the power a 와일더 manifests with her wild surge.

This improvement in 구현자 레벨 does not grant her any other benefits (정신결정 능력 do not advance, she does not gain higher-레벨 class 능력, and so on).

She cannot use 오버채널 psionic feat and invoke her wild surge at the same time.

At 3rd 레벨, a 와일더 can choose to boost her 구현자 레벨 by two instead of one. At 7 레벨, she can boost her 구현자 레벨 by up to three; at 11th 레벨, by up to four; at 15th 레벨, by up to five; and at 19th 레벨, by up to six.

In all cases, the wild surge effectively pays the extra power point cost that is normally required to augment the power; only the unaugmented power point cost is subtracted from 와일더의 power point reserve.

Psychic 무기력(Ex): Pushing oneself by invoking a wild surge is dangerous. Immediately following each wild surge, a 와일더 may be overcome by the strain of her effort. The chance of suffering psychic 무기력 is equal to 5% per 구현자 레벨 added with the wild surge.

A 와일더 who is overcome by psychic 무기력 is dazed until the end of her next turn and loses a number of 파워 포인트 equal to her 와일더 레벨.

Elude Touch (Ex): Starting at 2nd 레벨, a 와일더의 intuition supersedes her intellect, alerting her to danger from touch 공격(including 광선). She gains 보너스 to 방어도 against all touch 공격 equal to her 매력 보너스; however, her touch AC can never exceed her 방어도 against normal 공격.

Surging Euphoria (Ex): Starting at 4 레벨, when a 와일더 uses her wild surge ability, she gains a +1 의욕 보너스 on 명중 굴림, 피해 rolls, and 내성 굴림 for a number of rounds equal to the intensity of her wild surge.

If a 와일더 is overcome by psychic 무기력 following her wild surge, she does not gain 의욕 보너스 for this use of her wild surge ability.

At 12th 레벨, 의욕 보너스 on a 와일더의 명중 굴림, 피해 rolls, and 내성 굴림 increases to +2. At 20th 레벨, 보너스 increases to +3.

Volatile Mind (Ex): A 와일더의 temperamental mind is hard to encompass with 분야 of 정신감응. When any 정신감응 power is manifested on a 와일더 of 5th 레벨 or higher, the manifester of the power must pay 1 power point more than he otherwise would have spent.

The extra cost is not a natural part of that power의 cost. It does not augment the power; it is simply a wasted power point. 와일더의 volatile mind can force the manifester of 정신감응 power to exceed the normal power point limit of 1 point per 구현자 레벨. If the extra cost raises 정신감응 power의 cost to more points than the manifester has remaining in his reserve, the power simply fails, and the manifester exhausts the rest of his 파워 포인트.

At 9th 레벨, 페널티 assessed against 정신감응 powers manifested on a 와일더 is increased to 2 파워 포인트. At 13 레벨, 페널티 increases to 3 파워 포인트, and at 17th 레벨 it increases to 4 파워 포인트.

As a standard action, a 와일더 can choose to lower this effect for 1 round.

The spirit of the ideal body transforms a 워 마인드, granting him 피해 축소 1/–. At 6th 레벨, his 피해 축소 improves to 2/–. At 9th 레벨, his 피해 축소 improves to 3/–.

On each melee 공격 a 워 마인드 makes, he can choose squares he threatens that are adjacent to each other, and his 공격 apply to creatures in those two squares equally. A 워 마인드 can use this ability on any 공격, even an 공격 of opportunity or a 쪼개기 attempt.

A 워 마인드 cannot use this ability if he has moved more than 10 feet since the end of his last turn. If a 워 마인드 drops one or both of his foes with a sweeping strike, he can attempt a 쪼개기 normally; however, he makes only one 쪼개기 attempt per sweeping strike, even if he drops more than one foe.

Chain of Overwhelming Force (Su): At 10 레벨, a 워 마인드 learns the fourth principle of warfare for the individual combatant: to discover the underlying violence of the world and deliver it in a perfectly executed 공격.

워 마인드 taps into this underlying energy and apply it to a single 공격, dealing an extra 10d6 points of 피해. A 워 마인드 can use this power once per day. Activating this power is a free action. If 공격 misses, the power is wasted.
